page.title: 12A HOUSE OF 1985
page.content:
I live in a house in Dillywood Lane. lt has a front garden and also a small garden. l live next door to a field. The house is two stories high and has four rooms downstairs and five rooms upstairs. It also has a loft. I have cream wallpaper with silky white lines down it. The house is made of bricks which are dark and it is over 100 years old.I have lived there all my live. We have a side extension which is my bedroom. We have a garage and two cars. One is a gold renault, and the other is a red fiesta. We have a spectrum computer, two televisions and a video. We have a blue dial phone and a cream button phone which you can walk around with.
By Emma Fitzpatrick, Gordon School.
